name: Tea Rex
description:
A game where you make tea for dinosaurs. Made for the dino jam 2 (https://itch.io/jam/dinojam2) in ten days. Dinosaurs are randomized with semi-random orders.

How to play:

(Most importantly make sure you add water and magma to every drink)

1. When customers order tea go to the tea-making station by pressing the red arrow button on the right side of your screen

2. Drag the ingredients and tea bags into the volcano mug using your mouse

3. When they are all dragged into the mug press the red arrow button on the left to return to the order desk

4. If correct your score will go up a point, if incorrect you will lose a point

5. Try to get a high score and join the leaderboard

All art is made by me

Music by Eric Matyas (https://soundimage.org/)

Store bell sound effect free from mixkit (https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/bell/)
